allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add accounts and transactions management with dashboard integration

Implemented complete CRUD functionality for financial accounts and transactions with real-time dashboard updates.

New Features:
- Accounts page with create/edit/delete operations and type-based validation
- Transactions page with quick-add form supporting 6 event types
- Updated dashboard with live data from accounts and events APIs
- Dynamic form validation based on account/transaction types
- Event-sourced balance calculation for accounts

Backend Changes:
- Enhanced AccountEndpoints with balance calculation from events
- Complete EventEndpoints with CRUD operations

Frontend Changes:
- New AccountsPage with dialog-based CRUD \(Material Design\)
- New TransactionsPage with smart account filtering
- Updated DashboardPage to consume real API data
- Added navigation links for new pages
- TypeScript models for all API contracts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
